channel.title: Soccer on Andrea Cirillo
channel.description: Recent content in Soccer on Andrea Cirillo

item.title: Euro 2016 analytics: Who's playing the toughest game?
item.description: I am really enjoying Uefa Euro 2016 Footbal Competition, even because our national team has done pretty well so far. That’s why after browsing for a whileÂ statistics section of official EURO 2016 website I decided to do some analysis on the data they share ( as at the 21th of June). Just to be clear from the beginning: we are not talking of anything too rigourus, but just about some interesting questions with related answers gathered mainly through data visualisation.
